content: try this easy to follow crochet pacifier clip pattern that includes detailed step by step instructions with many photos this crochet dummy holder pattern will help you make your own crochet baby pacifier clip with confidence so don t hesitate and get started now and remember that i am happy to provide support with any of my crochet patterns if needed happy crocheting details - available only in english using us crochet terms - skill level begginer to intermediate crochet skills and knowledge - finished size length - 22cm 8 5 and width - 2 5cm 1 when using a 3mm = c/2 hook and light worsted #3 = dk yarn - gauge 2 length 12 single_crochet stitches and 6 puff stitches this crochet pacifier clip pattern consists of - step by step pattern descriptions including lots of photos for guidance - information about materials and equipment needed - list of abbreviations used in the pattern materials needed yarn this pattern will work nicely with 100% cotton 100% acrylic or a blend of both i recommend using light worsted #3 = dk yarn i used 3 different colours to make 3 clips light worsted #3 = dk yarn 100% cotton 1x ball of rico essentials cotton dk - colour fuchsia 14 - 50g/130m 1x ball of rico essentials cotton dk - colour pearl pink 55 - 50g/130m 1x ball of rico essentials cotton dk - colour cream 88 - 50g/130m i used 8g / 20m of the yarn to make one pacifier clip equipment needed - crochet hook 3mm = c/2 hook - scissors yarn needle metal or wooden clip you may sell the crochet items you made using this crochet dummy holder pattern as long as you credit me as the original designer
